original_text: And the battle increased that day: howbeit the king of Israel stayed himself up in his chariot against the Syrians until the even: and about the time of the sun going down he died.
korean_text: 이 날의 전쟁이 맹렬하였으므로 이스라엘 왕이 병거에서 겨우 지탱하며 저녁 때까지 아람 사람을 막다가 해가 질 즈음에 죽었더라

sentences.original_text: And the battle increased that day
howbeit the king of Israel stayed himself up
in his chariot against the Syrians
and about the time of the sun going down
